_header: Joy and grace peace love faith and charity
Subjects: Norbert, saint, life of; saints’ lives; envoys
_description: John Capgrave, Life of St. Norbert — in rhyme royal

HunHM55.First Lines:
IOye grace & pees loue feith & chariteEuyr rest up on
                    ȝour goodly religious breest…
HunHM55.Last Lines:
…A thousand four hundred & fourty eueneAftyr þis lyf
                    I pray god send us to heuene
